conclusion: Liquid will flow out from A, B, C, and D and pass through baffles to reach containers E, F, or G.

premise: Stream A flows downward and encounters the grey slanted barrier.
conclusion: Stream A is deflected to the left by the grey slanted barrier.

conclusion: This branch of Stream A flows into container E.

premise: The other branch of Stream A flows along the green baffle and impacts the pink slanted barrier.
conclusion: This branch of Stream A flows into container F.
